behavior.name: Synchro Master
behavior.author: FA
behavior.description: Synchronisation du master pour effectuer la t√¢che suivante ensemble.

param.name: Max_distance_to_surface
param.label: Max_distance_to_surface
param.hint: Set the maximum allowed distance to the surface

param.name: Max_distance_to_bottom
param.label: Max_distance_to_bottom
param.hint: Set the maximum allowed distance to the bottom

param.name: Difference_between_sub
param.label: Difference_between_sub
param.hint: Sets the difference between the sub to keep for sync

param.name: Mission_ID
param.label: Mission_ID
param.hint: Mission ID for the mission to sync the sub. State will check the previous mission.
